name: Jumping Clones
description:
Jumping Clones is a puzzle platformer where you control multiple characters at the same time, and they all must reach the exit. Some clones have different properties and you may need one type to help another.

Controls

Move: A/D or Left/Right Arrows

Jump: W/Up Arrow

Reset: R

Back: Esc or B

Update 1

Adjusted levels 5 and 7.
